EXTRA_TEXT: cards, you'll need to lay low and won't be able to draw more.

TEXT: Click this to review information at any time.

EXTRA_TEXT: #yAtlas has no #yEnergy - changes to #yEnergy will create or #yDevour cards in the #yExhaust #yPile instead. If you don't have enough cards #yExhausted, gain #rRavenous equal to the missing cost.
At the start of the turn #rRavenous will cause you to #rlose #rHP, then try to #yDevour #yExhausted cards to reduce itself.
#yFood begins combat #yExhausted, and #ySeconds cards will be added back to the hand a certain number of times when they're #yDevoured. NL NL Your deck starts with #b10 pieces of #yFood.
#yX-Cost Cards have a #yCap on #bX, and will play for exactly that amount. NL NL #yRelics that normally change #bMaximum #bEnergy will change the cap for #yX-Cost cards.
#yRisk is the limit to cards drawn past the #yStarting #yHand each turn, displayed on the #yEnergy #yOrb. NL NL It #yresets at the start of each turn.
